Package org.jfree.chart.block

Interface ContentBlock

All Superinterfaces:
Block, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContentBlock, ACITextTitle, AttributedLabelBlock, AttributedTextTitle, Axis, BlockContainer, CategoryAxis, CategoryAxis3D, CategoryPlot, ColorBlock, CombinedDomainCategoryPlot, CombinedDomainXYPlot, CombinedRangeCategoryPlot, CombinedRangeXYPlot, CompassPlot, CompositeTitle, ContourPlot, CyclicNumberAxis, DateAxis, DateTitle, EmptyBlock, ExtendedCategoryAxis, FastScatterPlot, ImageTitle, JFreeChart, LabelBlock, LegendGraphic, LegendTitle, LogarithmicAxis, MeterPlot, ModuloAxis, MultiplePiePlot, NestedGrid, NumberAxis, NumberAxis3D, PeriodAxis, PiePlot, PiePlot3D, Plot, PolarPlot, RingPlot, SpiderWebPlot, SubCategoryAxis, SymbolAxis, TextTitle, ThermometerPlot, Title, ValueAxis, WaferMapPlot, XYPlot, XYPlotWrapper
public interface ContentBlock extends Block
A block that has content surrounded by padding, a border and a margin.

  • Method Details

    • getDefaultWidth

      double getDefaultWidth()
      Returns the default width of the block, if this is known in advance. The actual width of the block may be overridden if layout constraints make this necessary.
      Returns:
      The default width.

    • setDefaultWidth

      void setDefaultWidth(double width)
      Sets the default width of the block, if this is known in advance.
      Parameters:
      width - the width (in Java2D units)

    • getDefaultHeight

      double getDefaultHeight()
      Returns the default height of the block, if this is known in advance. The actual height of the block may be overridden if layout constraints make this necessary.
      Returns:
      The default height.

    • setDefaultHeight

      void setDefaultHeight(double height)
      Sets the default width of the block, if this is known in advance.
      Parameters:
      height - the height (in Java2D units)

    • getMargin

      org.jfree.ui.RectangleInsets getMargin()
      Returns the margin.
      Returns:
      The margin (never null).

    • setMargin

      void setMargin(org.jfree.ui.RectangleInsets margin)
      Sets the margin (use RectangleInsets.ZERO_INSETS for no padding).
      Parameters:
      margin - the margin (null not permitted).

    • setMargin

      void setMargin(double top, double left, double bottom, double right)
      Sets the margin using the specified values in Java2D units.
      Parameters:
      top - the top margin.
      left - the left margin.
      bottom - the bottom margin.
      right - the right margin.

    • getBorder

      BlockBorder getBorder()
      Returns the border.
      Returns:
      The border (never null).

    • setBorder

      void setBorder(BlockBorder border)
      Sets the border for the block (use BlockBorder.NONE for no border).
      Parameters:
      border - the border (null not permitted).

    • setBorder

      void setBorder(double top, double left, double bottom, double right)
      Sets a black border with the specified line widths.
      Parameters:
      top - the top border line width.
      left - the left border line width.
      bottom - the bottom border line width.
      right - the right border line width.

    • getPadding

      org.jfree.ui.RectangleInsets getPadding()
      Returns the padding.
      Returns:
      The padding (never null).

    • setPadding

      void setPadding(org.jfree.ui.RectangleInsets padding)
      Sets the padding (use RectangleInsets.ZERO_INSETS for no padding).
      Parameters:
      padding - the padding (null not permitted).

    • setPadding

      void setPadding(double top, double left, double bottom, double right)
      Sets the padding.
      Parameters:
      top - the top padding.
      left - the left padding.
      bottom - the bottom padding.
      right - the right padding.
